member.summary: None of check. Allows all inputs and returns IsValidated as true.

member.summary: Digits characters only. Also that means 'Integer' numbers.

member.summary: Standard decimal check with coma or dot (depends on culture).

member.name: F:Plugin.InputKit.Shared.AnnotationType.Password
member.summary: Standard password check (at least a number and at least a char). MinLength should be set seperately.

member.name: F:Plugin.InputKit.Shared.AnnotationType.Phone
member.summary: Standard phone number check. Also you should use MinLength property with this type.

member.summary: You need to set RegexPattern property as your regex query to use this.
